ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND(!ISPICKVAL(Supervisor_reviewed_1__c,"" ),ISPICKVAL(Supervisor_Agree_Disagree_1__c,"")),
AND(!ISPICKVAL( Supervisor_reviewed_2__c ,""),ISPICKVAL( Supervisor_Agree_Disagree_2__c,"")),
AND(!ISPICKVAL( Supervisor_reviewed_3__c ,""),ISPICKVAL( Supervisor_Agree_Disagree_1_2__c,"")) )
